mapper.insert: INSERT INTO return_sales_order (billNo, documentStatusCaption, approveDate, customerId, customerName, materialId, materialName, realQuantity, taxPrice, totalAmountLC, saleOrgName) VALUES (#{billNo}, #{documentStatusCaption}, #{approveDate}, #{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{materialId}, #{materialName}, #{realQuantity}, #{taxPrice}, #{totalAmountLC}, #{saleOrgName}) on duplicate key update documentStatusCaption = VALUES(documentStatusCaption), approveDate = VALUES(approveDate), customerId = VALUES(customerId), customerName = VALUES(customerName), materialName = VALUES(materialName), realQuantity = VALUES(realQuantity), taxPrice = VALUES(taxPrice), totalAmountLC = VALUES(totalAmountLC), saleOrgName=values(saleOrgName)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM return_sales_order WHERE approveDate BETWEEN STR_TO_DATE(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND STR_TO_DATE(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY approveDate DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
